descripcion: Explore our wide selection of cajones flamencos, designed to offer you the best sound and quality. From traditional models to custom designs, we have the perfect cajon for every musician. Dive into our catalog and find the instrument that best suits your style and needs.
PersonalizacionTexto: Discover our wide range of customization options and unleash your creativity to design a truly unique product tailored to your preferences.
TutorialesTexto: Discover our selection of tutorials, designed to help you master new techniques and improve your skill in playing the cajon flamenco.
ShippingTimeInfo: Shipping time varies depending on location and shipping method. Typically, we process orders within 5 days and shipping time is 7 to 14 business days.
ContactCustomerService: How can I contact customer service?
ContactCustomerServiceInfo: You can reach us by phone at 622446556. We are here to assist you with any questions you may have.
ReturnPolicyInfo: We have a very flexible return policy in our company to ensure customer satisfaction. We accept returns within 30 days of receiving the product, provided certain conditions are met. For more information on our return policy and how to proceed with a return, please refer to our Returns Policy page or contact us directly.
TermsAndConditionsInfo: By using our website and/or making a purchase, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our website or making a purchase. Our company reserves the right to modify, alter, or update these terms at any time without prior notice.
TermsUpdateNotice: You will be notified of any changes by posting the updated terms on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically. Continued use of our website or making purchases after posting any changes constitutes acceptance of such changes.
PurchaseErrorTitle: Your purchase could not be completed
PurchaseErrorText: There was an issue processing your payment.
NoProductsInCart: There are no products in the cart.
PurchaseAddedToOrders: Your purchase has been added to the orders section.
CongratulationsCustomCajon: Congratulations, you've finished your custom cajon!
OwnerDetails: LaCajaCaballero S.L, hereinafter referred to as the Owner.

ResponsibilityDisclaimer: The Owner cannot assume any responsibility derived from the incorrect, inappropriate or illegal use of the information that appears on the Owner's Internet pages. Within the limits established by law, the Owner does not assume any responsibility derived from the lack of truthfulness, integrity, updating and accuracy of the data or information contained in its Internet pages.
ThirdPartyLinks: The Internet pages of the Owner may contain links to other pages of third parties that the Owner cannot control. Therefore, the Owner cannot assume responsibility for the content that may appear on third-party pages.
ContentOwnership: The texts, images, sounds, animations, software and other contents included on this website are the exclusive property of the Owner or its licensors. Any act of transmission, distribution, assignment, reproduction, storage or total or partial public communication must have the express consent of the Owner.
PageNotFound: The page you are looking for could not be found
OrderReadyForPickup: Your order is ready for pickup
NoOrdersYet: You don't have any orders yet
Name: Name
WhatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. These files contain information that can be read by the website on future visits. Cookies are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.
HowCookiesAreUsed: How are cookies used on this site?
HowCookiesAreUsedDescription: This website uses cookies for various purposes, including but not limited to:
EssentialCookies: Essential cookies: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the website and allow you to navigate the site and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the site.
FunctionalityCookies: Functionality cookies: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language, or region) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.
CookieControlDescription: You can control and manage the use of cookies on this website through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website and your user experience.
CookiePolicyChangesDescription: This cookie policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in cookie practices. You are encouraged to review this page regularly to stay informed about any updates. If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us through the contact information provided on our Legal Notice page.
PrivacyPolicyDescription: Lacajacaballero S.L. informs users of the website about its policy regarding the processing and protection of personal data of users and customers that may be collected by browsing or contracting services through its website. In this sense, Lacajacaballero S.L. guarantees compliance with current regulations on personal data protection, reflected in Organic Law 15/1999 of December 13, on the Protection of Personal Data and in Royal Decree 1720/2007, of December 21, approving the Development Regulation of the LOPD. The use of this website implies acceptance of this privacy policy.
DataCollectionDescription: Lacajacaballero S.L. is obliged to inform users of its website about the collection of personal data that may take place, either by sending an email or by filling in the forms included on the website. In this sense, Lacajacaballero S.L. will be considered responsible for the data collected through the means described above. At the same time, Lacajacaballero S.L. informs users that the purpose of processing the collected data includes: Attending to requests made by users and managing the commercial relationship. The operations, management, and technical procedures carried out in an automated or non-automated manner that enable the collection, storage, modification, transfer, and other actions on personal data are considered personal data processing. All personal data collected through Lacajacaballero S.L.'s website, and therefore considered personal data processing, will be included in the files declared to the Spanish Data Protection Agency by Lacajacaballero S.L.
ThirdPartyDisclosureTitle: 3. Communication of Information to Third Parties
ThirdPartyDisclosureDescription: Lacajacaballero S.L. informs users that their personal data will not be transferred to third-party organizations, except when such data transfer is covered by a legal obligation or when the provision of a service implies the need for a contractual relationship with a data processor. In the latter case, data transfer to the third party will only take place when Lacajacaballero S.L. has the express consent of the user.
UserRightsDescription: Organic Law 15/1999, of December 13, on the Protection of Personal Data grants data subjects the possibility to exercise a series of rights related to the processing of their personal data. As long as the user's data is being processed by Lacajacaballero S.L., users may exercise their rights of access, rectification, cancellation, and opposition in accordance with the provisions of the current legal regulations on personal data protection. To exercise these rights, the user must contact Lacajacaballero S.L. via email, providing documentation that proves their identity (ID card or passport) to info@lacajacaballero.com. This communication must include the following information: User's full name, the request for application, address, and supporting data. The exercise of rights must be carried out by the user. However, they may be executed by an authorized person as the user's legal representative. In this case, the documentation proving this representation must be provided.
LoginToBuy: Log in to buy the product.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover more about Juan Antonio Caballero Luna and our unique creations.
about.juanDescription: Juan Antonio Caballero Luna is a carpenter dedicated to creating cajones flamenco and furniture. With years of experience and a passion for music and dance, he has developed instruments that combine tradition and quality. Each cajon is unique, handmade with the best materials.
about.historyDescription: From our humble beginnings to becoming a reference in the manufacture of cajones flamenco, we have maintained an unwavering commitment to excellence. Every piece we create is a representation of our dedication and love for music.

achievement1.title: Placido Domingo's Percussionist
achievement1.description: Creation of cajon flamenco for Placido Domingo's percussionist.

achievement2.title: Satisfied Clients
achievement2.description: More than 1000 satisfied clients worldwide, using our cajons in various musical styles.

achievement3.title: Innovation and Quality
achievement3.description: Recognized for our innovation in design and superior product quality.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Welcome to our collection of flamenco cajon tutorials! Here you will find a variety of instructional videos that will help you learn and improve your skills with this versatile percussion instrument. From basic to advanced techniques, our tutorials are designed for musicians of all levels. Explore and discover new ways to express yourself through the rhythm and sound of the flamenco cajon!

faciles: 11 Seguiriyas: Applying Palms to the Cajon
medios: 7 Soleá, Soleá por Bulerías, Alegrías and Bulería
divertidos: Cajon Challenge - Christmas Carol with Pepe Abellán
